```{r}
library(readr)
data=read.csv("champions.csv",sep=';',row.names=1)
data$CLASS=as.factor(data$CLASS)
data$POSITION=as.factor(data$POSITION)
data$X.AS=parse_number(data$X.AS)
print(data)
```


```{r}
data2=data[,-c(14)]
print(data2)
library(FactoMineR)
res=PCA(data2,quali.sup=c(13),graph=F)
plot(res,choix="ind",habillage=13,select="cos2 0.8")
```



```{r}

data$X.AS=parse_number(data$X.AS)
data1=data[,-c(2,4,6,8,10)]
print(data)
print(data1)
table(data1$CLASS)
head(data1)

data2=data1[,-c(8)]
library(FactoMineR)
res=PCA(data2,quali.sup=c(8),graph=F)
plot(res,choix="ind",habillage=8,select="cos2 0.8")
```
```{r}
data3=data1[,-c(8)]

```
